tidbits.title: Mountain Kingdom
tidbits.description: Lesotho is known as the 'Mountain Kingdom' for its high-altitude terrain, boasting stunning mountain landscapes and hiking opportunities.

tidbits.title: Cultural Heritage
tidbits.description: The country has a rich cultural heritage, seen in its traditional rondavel huts, arts and crafts, and vibrant Basotho music and dance.

tidbits.title: Unique Geography
tidbits.description: Entirely surrounded by South Africa, Lesotho is one of the few countries globally to be entirely situated above 1,000 meters in elevation.
